auth_sentence.content: We are at a time where truth and fiction commingle.

sentences.en: I think I’ll commingle some of these blue flowers with the pink ones.
sentences.cn: 我想把一些蓝花和粉红花搀在一起。

sentences.en: His book commingles sarcasm and sadness.
sentences.cn: 他的作品混合了挖苦和悲伤。

sentences.en: Fact is inextricably commingled with fiction.
Tears commingled with the blood from the cut on his face.
sentences.cn: 眼泪和他脸上伤口流的血混在一起了。
